feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 10:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:39 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
